pullRequest.title: TimeLock client feedback api
pullRequest.bodyText:
Goals (and why):
TimeLock Api to accept client feedback for TimeLock adjudication.
Where should we start reviewing?:
TimeLockClientFeedbackResource.java
Priority (whenever / two weeks / yesterday):
Today

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                      The endpoint recieves feedback reports from clients which are required for TimeLock Adjudication.
          
          
            
                      The endpoint receives feedback reports from clients which are required for TimeLock Adjudication.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -12,3 +12,17 @@ types:
         fields:
           p99: double
           oneMin: double
+
+services:
+  TimeLockClientFeedbackService:
+    name: TimeLock Client Feedback Service
+    default-auth: header
+    package: com.palantir.atlasdb.timelock.adjudicate.feedback
+    base-path: /tl/feedback
+    endpoints:
+      reportFeedback:
+        http: POST /reportFeedback
+        args:
+          namespaces: ConjureTimeLockClientFeedback
+        docs: |
+          The endpoint recieves feedback reports from clients which are required for TimeLock Adjudication.

nodes.bodyText: This will cause null pointer exceptions if we add listeners or chain futures. Is there something else we could supply?

commit.message: Merge branch 'timelock_feedback_api' of github.com:palantir/atlasdb into timelock_feedback_api
